pinyin: lan4 ni2 fu2 bu4 shang4 qiang2

definition: see 爛泥扶不上牆|烂泥扶不上墙[lan4 ni2 fu2 bu4 shang4 qiang2]
pinyin: lan4 ni2 hu2 bu4 shang4 qiang2

sentences.english: They had to wade knee-deep through mud and debris to reach the victims.
sentences.chinese: 他們須通過齊膝的爛泥和堆積物。

sentences.english: Roses shave thorns, and silver fountains mud;
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰花有刺，銀色的泉有爛泥。

sentences.english: He pulled his foot out of the mud with a squelch.
sentences.chinese: 他撲哧一聲從爛泥裏拔出腳來。

sentences.english: The rotten bog water surface is floating each kind of trash, sends out smokes person's odor.
sentences.chinese: 爛泥塘水面漂浮着各種垃圾，散發出燻人的惡臭。

sentences.english: The muddy pond changed into a beautiful lotus pond after harnessing.
sentences.chinese: 經過治理，這片爛泥塘成了漂亮的荷花塘。

sentences.english: Today it is more like slush, " he says.
As the car race past, it spatter mud on my clothes.
sentences.chinese: 當汽車急馳而過時，它將爛泥濺在我衣服上。

sentences.english: Who was shovelling up the piles of dirt and grit left in the melted snow by the side of the road?
sentences.chinese: 又是誰把融化了的雪裏的一堆堆爛泥和沙礫鏟到路邊？

sentences.english: The Blue Shoe sunk deeper into the mud.
sentences.chinese: 藍鞋子深深地陷入了爛泥中。
他陷進齊膝深的爛泥裏。

sentences.english: They are decorated mud and blood.
sentences.chinese: 它們的裝飾是爛泥和鮮血。

sentences.english: Government is needed to get us out of it.
sentences.chinese: 政府需要把我們從這堆爛泥中解救出去。

definition: see 百孔千瘡|百孔千疮[bai3 kong3 qian1 chuang1]
lit. scattered ashes and dispersed smoke (idiom)/fig. to be annihilated/to vanish in a puff of smoke
head and face filthy with grime (idiom)/covered in dirt/dejected and depressed
to burst into tears/to sob loudly/to bawl
to vanish like smoke in thin air/to disappear
to gesticulate/to point out/to point the finger of blame
